website_summaries.verdict: Cost efficient modeler tool kit that has a nice range of different kinds of tools for beginners.
pros: Good price for a set of 20 tools for building and repairing models
Tweezers consist of high-quality materials and will last a long time
All items fit inside a plastic box, simplifying storage of the tools
cons: Experienced modelers probably will already have most of these tools

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to make a mini dollhouse kit and this was extremely helpful
customer_reviews.author: ModestTruthTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit or even intermediate kit
customer_reviews.text: I just got back into modelling and this kit has been ideal. I don't use all the items all the time, but I have used about 80% of them. I have used 20% of the kit 80% of the time. I have recommended it to a friend who is getting back into modelling as well.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: nice collection of instruments
customer_reviews.text: great overall. the fine point tweezers came with a tip protector because they can be very sharp - so NOT good for little kids or clumsy fingers. The tips are roughened up for good gripping. The fine wire cutter works well. The sanding instruments are okay. overall happy I got the kit. good price point
customer_reviews.author: AP fan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kit Perfect Price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little set of tools for the price. You get quite a bit, all of it I can use to work on my model kits. I don't really build Gundam's so those things I will give to a friend. The rest of it works perfect. It comes in a nice plastic case to keep all your tools handy. This is another great buy on Amazon. I highly recommend you pick this one up even for just build model kits it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Quality for Cheap
customer_reviews.text: So, I just got into Gunpla and I was struggling to find the perfect tools for the job... This ISN'T perfect, but it does have some bloody nice clippers and files. The kit is great for first timers, you get a bit of everything. They aren't too high quality, but they are much better than what you will get from walmart/target.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Almost everything you need in one kit. I'd replace the file set immediately though, that's the only real weak part of this. Everything else will last you for a few good years of hobby work.
customer_reviews.author: Talia Sturm

customer_reviews.title: Miniatures
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little tool Kit! The scissors and other cutting tools are made from precision steel and are very very sharp! High quality tools! Really impressed with the quality! Would liked to have a wooden tool box for them, they are much too nice to store in this little plastic box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent starter set. My only complaints, thus far, are the box cutter tends to loosen up frequently and the files are not great quality. However, for the cost, you get what you pay for and it could be much worse. All in all, I'm content with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Noaitall

customer_reviews.title: NICE TOOL SET TO OWN OR RECEIVED AS A GIFT.
customer_reviews.text: If your'e like me a model car builder this is a good set to own. you will use every part at one time.. great ideal and price...
customer_reviews.author: Roque soto jr

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice...has all the tools I wanted and needed to put together a plastic model. Been years since I've done that and wish I had these tools way back then. Great value and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The right tools for the job
customer_reviews.text: Got these to assemble a miniature house They were a great help. But, I guess nothing really helps when you don't know what you're doing and the instructions don't really help
customer_reviews.author: Doreene E. Keene

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Model Kit
customer_reviews.text: Has all the necessities needed to get working on the finer details of your model experience! For the price and the amount of content within the package, no complaints here. Good value...nice products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Howton

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for miniatures houses
customer_reviews.text: Has everything I need to assemble miniatures, except scissors. The tweezers all work well. The metal files are ok, I use the nail file types much more often though. The ruler, wire cutter, and utility knife are all great.
customer_reviews.author: K. James

customer_reviews.title: VERY HELPFUL
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this kit with a miniature house to build while quarantined and the kit was extremely helpful. Couldn't have built the house without it.
customer_reviews.author: LuvnAG

customer_reviews.title: Great for my models.
customer_reviews.text: Being new at building model kits, I had no idea the tools that might help, but this set contains a lot of helpful tools that I never would have thought of on my own. Definitely came in handy!
customer_reviews.author: mandican

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So many tools for this price is awesome! I love crafting different things and this helps alot
customer_reviews.author: maria terriquez

customer_reviews.title: Ok not totally happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Good product in case Case was broke with I got the products and the case should have been bigger and not packed so tight
customer_reviews.author: john vanschaick

customer_reviews.title: aw
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little kit, my only complaint is there are so many different ones I want one of them all PLUS side the tweezers, can get those pesky eyebrow hairs you just can't get with a regular pair of tweezers.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Parks

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: In building 1:48 airplanes, this collection was invaluable. I can't imagine trying to build without something like this.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for miniature craft projects.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I invested in this product. Having these tools made putting together my first miniature room so much easier. The tweezers are most helpful.
customer_reviews.author: joneshogan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Setup Of Equipmentt
customer_reviews.text: Nice quantity and quality of modeler instruments for the beginner or the advance modeler. The only thing missing with this set is a self sealing cutting mat. I would purchase this set again if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great little bunch of tools!
customer_reviews.text: Super handy, and a great selection in perfect sizes. Very pleased with these tools.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Wand

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is the model kit my husband never knew he needed. ;-) Now we have everything he needs all in one place and he doesn’t have to look all over the house for the tools that he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Heather J.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tool kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect kit for crafts. The tools are if s nice quality. They are all contained in the perfect container.
customer_reviews.author: mystery lover

customer_reviews.title: Quality kit!
customer_reviews.text: Kit comes with many helpful tools. Be careful when using the blade though because the tip chips off!!
customer_reviews.author: MayPa Thor

customer_reviews.title: Tools for models
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice set of tools designed to help the building of plastic models. The tools are good quality and they should be useful for the average individual. Being low in price, they are not professional level, but, with care they will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: In Miami

customer_reviews.title: Great for a start up
customer_reviews.text: Loved the many pieces and precision. The wire cutter really isn't strong and the tweezers could bend easy
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness that I have one of these, well worth it if you're doing miniatures.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: 20 Peace tool Set
customer_reviews.text: This 20 peace tool kit does the Job, Thanks for the fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Very good for plastic models
customer_reviews.text: Very good for plastic models. I use the tools in this kit building cars with my sons and the only complaint I have is I need to buy at least one more kit so I don't have to wait for my turn!
customer_reviews.author: Rock Crawler

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great little set with a box to hold everything. The cutters are excellent quality and cut off parts very close! Nice value set!
customer_reviews.author: The Zoo

customer_reviews.title: good quality!
customer_reviews.text: husband is a dork, builds gundams, he loves his tools
customer_reviews.author: Teagan Prunty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need in this tight little package . Excellent for beginners who dont want to go all out .
customer_reviews.author: Stebon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm building a miniature dollhouse and the tools are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, I have not been able to use it yet but it has so many accessories for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Gallardocoghlan

customer_reviews.title: Kit is everything it's supposed to be.  By why no bubble wrap?
customer_reviews.text: Got mine today. The nippers cut flawlessly. My only complaint is the package didn't have anything to protect it. The side of the case has a minor pair of cracks and I have the feeling it happened in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Koniving

customer_reviews.title: Just what I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: This is just what my husband needed to work on his models with. He doesn't know what he did without these tools now.
customer_reviews.author: CWKassian

customer_reviews.title: Great modeling tools
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a bargain! Great tools for modeling. You have to own a set of these if you’re taking on a project.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Quality, and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pieces, some I dont even use but great to have just incase.
customer_reviews.author: Tosh Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son and he said this was exactly what he needed.
customer_reviews.author: CrissyGrace

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to build dollhouses with my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! Lots of useful tools, and a good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Pam Cates

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the price. Id highly recommend this for anyone in need a complete kit to get started with a hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mcarthur

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Its simple to use i havent used every tool yet but everthing seems prety sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality items
customer_reviews.text: i wish there had been a list of contents, to be honest i don't know what everything is for.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Terry

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: When I get my order the box is broken but I got everything that's in the picture. Overall it pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Mei

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for. Very nice kit for beginners. (Like me!)
customer_reviews.author: Dawna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It came with everything in the picture and they work well
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I did my miniature doll houses without this
customer_reviews.author: Tina G

product_meta.title: BXQINLENX Professional 20 PCS Gundam Model Tools Kit Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set Hobby Building Tools Kit for Gundam Car Model Building Repairing and Fixing(I)
feature_bullets: ● FUNCTION---EASY TO USE---The modeler basic tools set is suitable for a beginner and advanced modeler as well.You can use it to manufacture many toys,such as cars, robots, cartoon, buildings, airplanes and other crafts.
● FULL RANGE AND COST EFFICIENT---Package include : 2 X Screwdriver;5 X Files; 1 X Separator; 1 X Steel rule; 3 X Polishing Block; 5 X Tweezers;1 X Graver and 1 Box Blade;1 X Diagonal Pliers.
● DURABLE---The tweezers are made by stainless steel and can be used for a long time.The cutting pliers is made of carbon steels, good durability.Other items also have high quality.
● LIGHTWEIGHT AND PORTABLE---Packaged in a sturdy plastic box.When you use them, you will feel more convenience.You can take it to anywhere,use it in anytime.It will be a good assistant to you.

● Sold by LENX---Please make sure this product is soled by LENX.If there is any question about the product,please don't hesitate to contact with us.Looking forward to your masterpiece!!!And also you can share your works on this page.
